mapper.update: update template_attribute set url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, roleid = #{roleid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, rolename = #{rolename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, timeout = #{timeout,jdbcType=TINYINT}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updateTime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, template_id = #{templateId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, nodeCode = #{nodecode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `nodeName` = #{nodename,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, url, roleid, rolename, timeout, createtime, updateTime, template_id, nodeCode, `nodeName` from template_attribute where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, url, roleid, rolename, timeout, createtime, updateTime, template_id, nodeCode, `nodeName` from template_attribute
